name: Send Paystack invoices from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Make will watch for new rows in a specified Google Sheets spreadsheet, create customers in Paystack, then create invoices and send notifications to customers. This template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1c_9qd2-7NHjXH76z7wCBk4vL4kFzrgmOhs6P_jD5Zxo/edit?usp=sharing).
